co.janicek.core.html.CanvasCore

type
class
Functions for working with HTML Canvas.

Static Variables

public CANVAS_ALPHA_OFFSET(inline,null) : Int

public CANVAS_BLUE_OFFSET(inline,null) : Int

public CANVAS_ELEMENTS_PER_PIXEL(inline,null) : Int

public CANVAS_GREEN_OFFSET(inline,null) : Int

public CANVAS_RED_OFFSET(inline,null) : Int

Static Methods

public addNoise( pixelData : html5.ImageData, randomSeed : Int, noiseLevel : Int, ?grayScale : Bool, ?changeRed : Bool, ?changeGreen : Bool, ?changeBlue : Bool, ?changeAlpha : Bool ) : html5.ImageData

parameters
noiseLevel Value between 1 and 255
grayScale True to change all color channels by same amount so only brightness of pixel is changed and not color. Doesn't affect alpha. (Default = false)
red Add noise to red channel. (Default = true)
green Add noise to green channel. (Default = true)
blue Add noise to blue channel. (Default = true)
alpha Add noise to alpha channel. (Default = false)
returns
New bitmap containing the bitmap passed in with noise added.
Add random noise to image data by modifying each pixel color channel by a random amount between + and - noiseLevel.

public addNoiseToCanvas( context : html5.CanvasRenderingContext2D, randomSeed : Int, noiseLevel : Int, ?grayScale : Bool, ?red : Bool, ?green : Bool, ?blue : Bool, ?alpha : Bool ) : Void

parameters
context Canvas drawing context.
randomSeed Random seed to use to make random noise.
noiseLevel Value between 1 and 255
grayScale True to change all color channels by same amount so only brightness of pixel is changed and not color. Doesn't affect alpha. (Default = false)
red Add noise to red channel. (Default = true)
green Add noise to green channel. (Default = true)
blue Add noise to blue channel. (Default = true)
alpha Add noise to alpha channel. (Default = false)
Add noise to canvas.

public getImageData( image : html5.Image ) : html5.ImageData

Get image data from an HTML image.

public invertBitmap( bitmap : Array<Array<Bool>> ) : Array<Array<Bool>>

parameters
bitmap Array of bool to invert.
returns
Inverted array of bool.
Inverts an array of bool.

public loadFileIntoImage( file : html5.File, img : html5.Image ) : Void

Load a file into an image.

public loadImage( url : String, f : html5.Image -> Void ) : Void

parameters
url Image to load.
f Called when image is loaded.
Load an image from a URL.

public makeAverageThresholdBitmap( imageData : html5.ImageData, threshold : Int ) : Array<Array<Bool>>

parameters
threshold Value between 0 and 255.
Convert image to monochrome bitmap boolean array. Converts HTML5 image data to a 2D Array of Bool by comparing the average of each color channel to a threshold value to determine which color channels are converted to 0 and 1.

public makeAverageThresholdImageData( imageData : html5.ImageData, threshold : Int, lessthanThresholdColor : Int, greaterthanOrEqualToThresholdColor : Int, ?alpha : Float ) : html5.ImageData

parameters
threshold Value between 0 and 255.
lessthanThresholdColor Color to use for pixels below threshold.
greaterthanOrEqualToThresholdColor Color to use for pixels equal to or above threshold.
alpha Optioal alpha to assign to result pixels. (default = 1.0)
Converts HTML5 image data to monochrome image data by comparing the average of each color channel to a threshold value to determine which color channels are converted to target monochrome colors.

public makeBitmap( imageData : html5.ImageData, f : Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Bool ) : Array<Array<Bool>>

Make a boolean array from html image data.

public makeImageDataUrlFromImageData( imageData : html5.ImageData ) : String

Make image data URL from image data.

public renderCanvasPixelArray( imageData : html5.ImageData, f : Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Null<{ red : Null<Int>, green : Null<Int>, blue : Null<Int>, alpha : Null<Int>}> ) : Void

Iterate canvas pixel array color channels. Functor is called with red, green, blue, and alpha channel values for each pixel. Functor can return new color channel values which will be assigned to pixel. Null values are ignored. Can be used to analyze and transform a canvas pixel array.
